duties_responsibilities.duty: Process daily invoices and expense reports
Run weekly A/P vendor checks and ACHs verifying closing documents are processed correctly before processing subcontractor payments
Vendor contact for Accounting Department to address open items and confirmation of vendor onboarding process
Prepare vendor credit applications for Executive review and approval
Set up and maintain vendor profiles in QuickBooks and ensure data integrity
Assist with creating and continue to maintain a detailed manual of Account Payable procedures and workflows
Organization of electronic and physical vendor data storage including daily filing
Assist Accounting Manager in preparing and completing Worker’s Compensation annual audit
Other duties and special projects as assigned

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in related field or five (5) years of experience in the accounting field
